course.headings: How To Use Options To Hedge Your Portfolio?
How To Use Options With Stock?
The Art Of Making Options Strategies

syllabus.title: Ep 1 - Options: Introduction & Beyond
syllabus.subtitle: This section discusses various derivatives and why and how about them. This includes the usage of the evolution of the derivatives and its market

syllabus.title: Ep 2 - Options: The Beginning
syllabus.subtitle: This section deals with modern options contracts and related terminology such as Call, Put, ITM, OTM, Open Interest and more.

syllabus.title: Ep3 - Options: The Pricing
syllabus.subtitle: This section discusses how an option gets its value and various factors affecting the same.

syllabus.title: Ep4 - Options: The Life
syllabus.subtitle: Every option comes with an expiry. What happens when an option expires? What is the assignment and exercise of the options?

syllabus.title: Ep5 - Options Strategies: The Beginning
syllabus.subtitle: This session starts with basic options strategies using call and put options. Which will make you think about making strategies.

syllabus.title: Ep6 - Options Strategies: Hedging
syllabus.subtitle: This session will discuss how to hedge your portfolio to avoid extreme losses. Here we will discuss how to use options with stocks.

syllabus.title: Ep7 - Options Strategies: Simple To Deploy Strategies
syllabus.subtitle: This session will discuss the simple yet effective options strategies and how to adjust them if the market doesn’t go according to your expectations.
syllabus.alt: Options Trading Simple And Deploy Strategies

syllabus.title: Ep8 - Option Strategies: Complex Strategies
syllabus.subtitle: This session will discuss strategies, with multi-leg and which are complex in nature. This includes adjustments as well.

syllabus.title: Ep1 - Management Part 1: Who is Running The Show?
syllabus.subtitle: It’s company management who either makes or breaks the company. Learn how to find the best management who can take the company to the heights of success.

syllabus.title: Ep2 - Management Part 2: Finding Honesty & Integrity in Management
syllabus.subtitle: Learning to bet on the people of the company, not on the company, because a company is nothing but a number of individuals gathered together to solve a problem.

syllabus.title: Ep3 - Cash Flow Statement Part 1: Uncovering Truth in Fake Numbers
syllabus.subtitle: An underrated part of financial statement, which is seldom used. Cash is the most difficult thing to get manipulated and that's why most trustworthy.

syllabus.title: Ep4 - Cash Flow Statement Part 2: Har Chamakti Chiz Sona Nahi Hoti
syllabus.subtitle: Learning to use cash flow statements as a tool to get a true picture of any business using ratio analysis and more.
syllabus.alt: How to check Cash Flow Statement

syllabus.title: Ep5 - P&L Statement: Munafa Hi Bhagwan Hai
syllabus.subtitle: The P&L (Profit and Loss) Statement Analysis chapter centers on the assessment of a company's financial performance over a specific period. It delves into the revenue, expenses, and resulting profit or loss generated by the company's operations.

syllabus.title: Ep6 - Financial Ratio Analysis: Powerful Tricks to CT Scan Companies
syllabus.subtitle: Learning to read between the lines to find the real performance of the company.

syllabus.title: Ep7 - Balance Sheet: A Single Sheet Of Paper Determines The Future
syllabus.subtitle: The Balance Sheet Statement Analysis focuses on evaluating a company's financial position at a specific point in time. It examines the company's assets, liabilities, and shareholders' equity, offering insights into its overall financial health and stability.

syllabus.title: Ep8 - Valuation Part 1: Buying Gold at The Price of Silver
syllabus.subtitle: It’s better to buy a wonderful company at a fair price than a fair company at a wonderful price, says Warren Buffett. This in itself talks about the importance of value investing in the stock market.
syllabus.alt: Buying Gold at The Price of Silver

syllabus.title: Ep9 - Valuation Part 2: 3 Valuation Hacks to Find Undervalued Gems
syllabus.subtitle: Learning to find value stocks with a relatively low price.
syllabus.alt: Valuation Hacks to Find Undervalued Gems

syllabus.title: Ep10 - Growth Investing: Warren Buffett’s Secret Recipe
syllabus.subtitle: Just value investing is not enough, you also need to focus on the growth potential of the company. Learn how to do it in this chapter.

syllabus.title: Ep11 - Multibagger Companies Part 1: Finding The Rocket
syllabus.subtitle: Don’t invest in stocks if you can’t beat index funds. Hence it’s crucial to find multibagger stocks at the early stage.

syllabus.title: Ep12 - Multibagger Companies Part 2: Fueling The Rocket
syllabus.subtitle: Learning to find a cluster for potential multibagger companies.

syllabus.title: Ep13 - Forensic Analysis: Kuchh To Gadbad Hai Daya!
syllabus.subtitle: Learn to read between the lines. Things that are not even on financial statements, and which no one is talking about.

syllabus.title: Ep14 - Banking Sector: Where Money is The Product
syllabus.subtitle: Banks have got their own charm and their own methods to get analyzed.

syllabus.title: Ep15 - Stock Broking: The Only Person Making Money In The Stock Market
syllabus.subtitle: An industry which is an integral part of our life as investors, yet we don't understand the real business of the same.

syllabus.title: Ep16 - Becoming a Successful Independent Investor.
syllabus.subtitle: Product Analysis

syllabus.title: How to Invest Your First 10K - Part 1
syllabus.subtitle: At the start, we always think that every second stock we find is an excellent opportunity, or some of us realise that we have been missing many opportunities, and both things are not valid. In this section, we start with the basics of investing your first money.

syllabus.title: How to Invest Your First 10K - Part 2
syllabus.subtitle: This section is like a handheld support to help you invest your first 10K.
syllabus.alt: Understand how to grow your initial investment

syllabus.title: How to Invest in Your First Winning IPO
syllabus.subtitle: Investing in an IPO for listing gain and holding the share for the long term are two different things, and this section deals with both. After this section, you will be able to find such IPOs that give you quick wins in the form of listing gain or can give you a stock to hold on to.

syllabus.title: 5 Tools to Pick Winning Stocks Faster
syllabus.subtitle: Here you will learn to do basic financial analysis and ratios to pick fundamentally good stocks for your portfolio which can outperform the index in the long term.

syllabus.title: Penny Stock ki Duniya
syllabus.subtitle: How can you find a penny that can be a titan for you?

syllabus.title: Avoid These 3 Mistakes to Save Lakhs
syllabus.subtitle: It is essential to know what to do in the stock market, but it is more important to know what NOT to do in the stock market.

syllabus.title: Psychology of Making Money
syllabus.subtitle: Making is not an art, nor is it a science. It is a craft. A craft that can be perfected with the right tools, technique, mindset and more. And this section will talk about that.

syllabus.title: Saving Your Stock Taxes
syllabus.subtitle: Do you want to give away your profits from the stock market to anyone? I hope not. This section will talk about the best way to save your capital gain taxes.

faq.question: How this course is different from The Foundation Course On Indian Stock Market (Beginner)?
faq.answer: This course deals with more advanced applications and investment tools whereas the beginner course talks about basic practical applications in the stock market, which is very useful for a beginner. If you want to learn advanced tools and techniques to invest in the stock market you should go for this course.

faq.question: Is the course in Hindi or in English?
faq.answer: Course uses a primary language of Hindi but uses English as well in appropriate places

faq.question: Is it a pre-recorded course or live?
faq.answer: It is a pre-recorded course with lifetime access.

faq.question: Will I get a certificate of completion?
How to access this course after payment?
faq.answer: After payment you will get a login link and credential on your whatsapp number and mail. There you can access your course.

faq.question: Is this course focused on investors or traders?
faq.answer: This course is focused on long term investors.

faq.question: For what duration am I getting the course?
faq.answer: This course comes with lifetime access.

faq.question: Can I get a GST Invoice with this course?
faq.answer: Yes, you will get a GST invoice

faq.question: Can I get a refund, if I don’t like the course?
faq.answer: Yes, you can opt for a full refund anytime within 5 days of purchase. To request a refund just write a mail to support@convey.in

faq.question: Does this course include technical analysis (Charts and indicators)?
faq.answer: This course is designed for investors and not for traders, hence it doesn't need technical analysis.

faq.question: What skills are needed for fundamental analysis?
faq.answer: You should have knowledge of basic maths with some working knowledge of the stock market.
